messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.

messages.title: DEMAND BETTER FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom. Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal. A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

politicalExperience.achievements: introduced shared parental leave and clamped down on unscrupulous payday loan lenders.

contactInformation.address: Hertsmere Liberal Democrats,Callee House, 49 Theobald Street, Borehamwood WD6 4RT
